title: Three dead in train – jeep tragedy
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A father and two children died in Mirusuvil on Friday (22) when a train plying from Jaffna to Colombo crashed through a jeep.
The tragedy had reportedly taken place at approximately 11 AM on Friday (22).
At the same time, another express train that was traveling from Colombo to Batticaloa collided with a lorry at the Deniya railway crossroad.
The driver of the lorry was injured and he was admitted to the Alawwa Hospital.
#PriceHike : 12.5 kg gas cylinder price increased to Rs. 5,175/-
